Package projet_techno_l3.imageeditor.ImageModifications.convolution

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GaussianBlur
    This algorithm was replaced by the one using RenderScript.
    GaussianBlurRS
    Applies a Gaussian Blur using RenderScript to an image.
    LaplacianFilter
    Applies a Laplacian filter on the image
    MeanBlur
    This algorithm was replaced by the one using RenderScript.
    MeanBlurRS
    Applies a mean value to the center pixel of a square matrix, taking into account all the other pixels values.
    SobelFilter
    Applies a Sobel filter on an image
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BlurValues
    Different values for the Blur filters.
